title: Einhorn Mommsenstrasse
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Buffet, Salad bar, Take-out, Catering, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Migh have one time been fully vegetarian but no longer. Converted shop in a classic Berlin Jugendstil building. Its deli cafe offers a lunch buffet, many salads. Self service style. Most tables are for standing, with some high chairs. Has veggie choices but recommended not for vegans.
